Yoga: Yoga is a great way to improve flexibility, balance, and overall fitness. You can do various yoga poses to improve your flexibility and balance.
Jumping: Jumping is a great way to improve your cardiovascular fitness and burn calories. You can jump for 30 seconds and then rest for 30 seconds.
Running: Running is a great way to improve your cardiovascular fitness and burn calories. You can run for 30 minutes and then rest for 30 minutes.
Swimming: Swimming is a great way to improve your cardiovascular fitness and burn calories. You can swim for 30 minutes and then rest for 30 minutes.
Cycling: Cycling is a great way to improve your cardiovascular fitness and burn calories. You can cycle for 30 minutes and then rest for 30 minutes.
